wikipedia_page.main: Paul Jackson (born (1978-09-29)29 September 1978) is a former Scotland international rugby league footballer who played as a prop or second-row in the 1990s, 2000s and 2010s. He played at club level for the Huddersfield Giants (two spells), Wakefield Trinity Wildcats, Castleford Tigers (Heritage No. 795) (two spells), Whitehaven and the Dewsbury Rams.
